effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect_entries.short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon cannot be poisoned.  This includes bad poison.

If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
